Articles.Content: I seem to remember that almost everything made by Unity, whenever it starts up has a giant "Powered by Unity " sign and KSP doesn't seem to have this.Why? Sorry if this seems a little redundant, I'm just curious
This should really belong in Space Lounge or General, but if you use the free version of unity, you get the "Powered by Unity" ad. If you use the payed version, you don't.
